languages.text: Чтобы начать кооперативную игру, необходимо игровое сохранение. Если сохранений нет, запустите игру в одиночном режиме и создайте персонажа. После вступительного ролика выберите "кооперативный режим" в настройках.
languages.original_text: To start a co-op game, a game save is required. If there are no saves, start the game in single player mode and create a character. After the introductory video, choose 'cooperative mode' in the settings.

languages.text: To start a co-op game, a game save is required. If there are no saves, start the game in single player mode and create a character. After the introductory video, choose 'cooperative mode' in the settings.
languages.original_text: Чтобы начать кооперативную игру, необходимо игровое сохранение. Если сохранений нет, запустите игру в одиночном режиме и создайте персонажа. После вступительного ролика выберите "кооперативный режим" в настройках.

traits.locale_text: To start a co-op game, a game save is required. If there are no saves, start the game in single player mode and create a character. After the introductory video, choose 'cooperative mode' in the settings.

To start a co-op game, a game save is required. If there are no saves, start the game in single player mode and create a character. After the introductory video, choose 'cooperative mode' in the settings.

To start a co-op game, a game save is required. If there are no saves, start the game in single player mode and create a character. After the introductory video, choose 'cooperative mode' in the settings.

languages.text: Une sauvegarde est nécessaire pour lancer une partie en coopération. S'il n'y a aucune sauvegarde, lancez le jeu en mode Solo et créez un personnage. Après la cinématique d'introduction, choisissez Mode Coopération dans les paramètres.
languages.original_text: To start a co-op game, a game save is required. If there are no saves, start the game in single player mode and create a character. After the introductory video, choose 'cooperative mode' in the settings.

traits.locale_text: Pour lancer une partie en coopération, une sauvegarde est nécessaire. S'il n'y a aucune sauvegarde, lancez le jeu en mode Solo et créez un personnage. Après la vidéo d'introduction, choisissez mode Coopération dans les paramètres.

languages.text: Um ein Koop-Spiel zu starten, wird ein Spielstand benötigt. Wenn es keine Spielstände gibt, musst du das Spiel im Einzelspielermodus starten und einen Charakter erstellen. Nach dem Introvideo kannst du in den Einstellungen den Koop-Modus auswählen.
languages.original_text: To start a co-op game, a game save is required. If there are no saves, start the game in single player mode and create a character. After the introductory video, choose 'cooperative mode' in the settings.

traits.locale_text: Um ein Koop-Spiel zu starten, wird ein Spielstand benötigt. Wenn es keine Spielstände gibt, musst du das Spiel im Einzelspielermodus starten und einen Charakter erstellen. Nach dem Introvideo kannst du in den Einstellungen den Koop-Modus auswählen.

languages.text: 協力モードを開始するには、セーブデータが必要です。セーブデータがない場合は、シングルプレイヤーモードでゲームを開始し、キャラクターを作成しましょう。導入のカットシーンの後、設定で「協力モード」を選択してください。
languages.original_text: To start a co-op game, a game save is required. If there are no saves, start the game in single player mode and create a character. After the introductory video, choose 'cooperative mode' in the settings.

traits.locale_text: 協力モードを開始するには、セーブデータが必要です。セーブデータがない場合は、シングルプレイヤーモードでゲームを開始し、キャラクターを作成しましょう。導入のカットシーンの後、設定で「協力モード」を選択してください。

languages.text: 若要开始合作模式，您需要先保存存档。如果您没有存档，请在单人模式下开始游戏，创建您自己的角色。开场动画结束之后，在设置中选择“合作模式”即可。
languages.original_text: To start a co-op game, a game save is required. If there are no saves, start the game in single player mode and create a character. After the introductory video, choose 'cooperative mode' in the settings.

traits.locale_text: 若要开始合作模式，您需要先保存存档。如果您没有存档，请在单人模式下开始游戏，创建您自己的角色。开场动画结束之后，在设置中选择“合作模式”即可。

languages.text: Para empezar una partida cooperativa, necesitas una partida guardada. Si no hay guardados, empieza el juego en modo un jugador y crea un personaje. Después del vídeo de introducción, elige el modo cooperativo en Ajustes.
languages.original_text: To start a co-op game, a game save is required. If there are no saves, start the game in single player mode and create a character. After the introductory video, choose 'cooperative mode' in the settings.

traits.locale_text: Para empezar una partida cooperativa, necesitas una partida guardada. Si no hay guardados, empieza el juego en modo un jugador y crea un personaje. Después del vídeo de introducción, elige el modo cooperativo en Ajustes.

languages.text: Eşli bir oyuna başlamak için bir oyun kaydı gerekir. Kayıt yoksa oyunu tek oyunculu modda başlat ve bir karakter oluştur. Giriş videosundan sonra ayarlardan 'eşli mod'u seç.
languages.original_text: To start a co-op game, a game save is required. If there are no saves, start the game in single player mode and create a character. After the introductory video, choose 'cooperative mode' in the settings.
